title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response must show appropriate work in order to receive the point.
descriptions:
The response does not correctly calculate the average variable cost of the fifth unit or does not show appropriate work.

title: Part (b)
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response must both identify the profit-maximizing output as 4 hats and explain why using marginal analysis in order to receive the point.
descriptions: The response does not identify the profit-maximizing output as 4 hats or does not explain that when the firm produces 4 hats, its marginal revenue D=MR MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngB PrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9fr Fj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=x fr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaabseaca qG9aGaaeytaiaabkfaaaa@3DDF@ (MR) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngB PrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9fr Fj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=x fr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaabIcaca qGnbGaaeOuaiaabMcaaaa@3DAF@ is $9 and its marginal cost (MC) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngB PrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9fr Fj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=x fr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaabIcaca qGnbGaae4qaiaabMcaaaa@3DA0@ is $8(=$32-$24) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@436E@ . A profit-maximizing firm will never produce at the quantity where MC MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGnbGaae4qaa aa@3A94@ exceeds MR MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngB PrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9fr Fj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=x fr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaab2eaca qGsbaaaa@3C58@ .

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response must both state that the profit-maximizing output will remain as 4 hats and explain why in order to earn the point.
descriptions: The response does not identify the profit-maximizing output as 4 hats or does not explain that that when the firm produces 4 hats, its marginal revenue MR MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngBPrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaad2eacaWGsbaaaa@3C5A@ is $9 and its marginal cost ( MC MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngBPrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaad2eacaWGdbaaaa@3C4B@ ) is $8. The rent is a fixed cost and does not change MC MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngBPrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaad2eacaWGdbaaaa@3C4B@ or MR MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngBPrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaad2eacaWGsbaaaa@3C5A@ ; therefore, there is no short-run impact on output.

The response states that the profit-maximizing output remains 4 hats and explains that when the firm produces 4 hats, its marginal revenue MR MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngBPrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaad2eacaWGsbaaaa@3C5A@ is $9 and its marginal cost ( MC MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngBPrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaad2eacaWGdbaaaa@3C4B@ ) is $8. The rent is a fixed cost and does not change MC MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngBPrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaad2eacaWGdbaaaa@3C4B@ or MR MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqr1ngBPrgifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaad2eacaWGsbaaaa@3C5A@ ; therefore, there is no short-run impact on output.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes both of the criteria below.
